description: One of Mountain Hardwear's classics re-tooled, this is the ultimate wrinkle-resistant, quick-drying shirt for hiking, trekking and life outside. Made from 100% polyester dobby fabric, the Canyon long-sleeve boasts legendary performance details: a flip-up collar that protects from harmful UV rays, vents on the sides, core, and back cape for extra cooling, and generous zip chest pockets to hold valuables. Lightweight and durable, it looks great on and off the trail.
name: Mountain Hardwear Canyon LS Shirt, Tall - Mens
